description: Known specimen x transcript pairs that haven't been scanned yet. These are podcast episodes where a specimen leader appeared on a source with full transcripts available, but we haven't deep-scanned the transcript. Serves both general research enrichment AND purpose claims scanning.

gaps.notes: Intercom is M3 Embedded Teams. Traynor likely has rich claims about AI customer service agents replacing human workflows.
Shopify was web-scanned (5 claims found) but NOT transcript-deep-scanned from Cheeky Pint. May yield additional claims in conversational context.

gaps.episodeTitle: Ilya Sutskever — We're moving from the age of scaling to the age of research
gaps.notes: SSI is M9 AI-Native. Sutskever's founding vision and departure from OpenAI context — expect rich identity and direction-under-uncertainty claims.

gaps.episodeTitle: Satya Nadella — How Microsoft is preparing for AGI (Nov 2025) + Microsoft's AGI plan (Feb 2025)
gaps.notes: Microsoft already has 15 claims. Two Dwarkesh episodes may yield additional direction-under-uncertainty claims about AGI preparation and CapEx.

gaps.episodeTitle: Demis Hassabis: Future of AI, Simulating Reality (Ep #475)
gaps.notes: Google DeepMind is M1 Research Lab. Hassabis is a Nobel Prize winner — expect identity claims about scientific mission and direction-under-uncertainty.

gaps.episodeTitle: Sundar Pichai: CEO of Google and Alphabet (Ep #471)
gaps.notes: Pichai's structural commentary on Google's 25-year evolution and Gemini deployment. Expect transformation-framing and identity claims.
Novo Nordisk is M4 Hub-and-Spoke. Acquired episode covers company history — may have structural context but less likely to have AI-specific purpose claims.
Already deep-scanned for research but not specifically for purpose claims. Rich structural history of Google's AI evolution.

gaps.episodeTitle: Brendan Foody on Teaching AI and the Future of Knowledge Work (Ep #267)
gaps.notes: Mercor is M9 AI-Native. Youngest unicorn founder. Expect identity and direction-under-uncertainty claims about AI-native organizational design.
Sierra is M9 AI-Native. Bret Taylor (Chairman of OpenAI, creator of Google Maps) founding a conversational AI company — expect rich identity claims about AI-native organizational design.
